name: Keep Warm (ADMAN, PLKDTCHCB)
description:
Team Dingo ThreeThingGame Autumn 2021 Game Jam Submission Frozen, Camel, Leaves Description:

You're freezing to death. You've only got five minutes left before you succumb to the cold. Search the environment around you for tools and materials to help you survive.

Made By:

Adam Lutton (Design, Programming, Level Rigging, 2D Art, Textures)

Alex Hall (Design, 3D Art, Textures)

Jordan Windram (Sounds & Music)

Made With:

Unity, Blender, Aseprite

Controls: PCPS / XboxMovementWASDLeft StickCameraMouse MovementRight StickJumpSpaceCross / ACrouchCtrlCircle / BRunShiftL3InteractESquare / XDrop ItemQTriangle / YPrimary AttackLeft Mouse ButtonR1 / RB
